mapper.insert: insert into user(profileImage, nickName, email, password, p_qId, p_answer) values(#{profileImage}, #{nickName}, #{email}, #{password}, #{p_qId}, #{p_answer})
mapper.update: update user set profileImage=#{profileImage}, nickName=#{nickName}, password=#{password}, p_qId=#{p_qId}, p_answer=#{p_answer} where userId=#{userId}
mapper.select: select * from user where email Like CONCAT('%',#{email},'%')
